title: Pete Prisco on Jaguars, Teddy B trade, sleepers and Hard Knocks recap (Football 08/22)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by CBS Sports' Pete Prisco to explain why the Jaguars won't be trading for Teddy Bridgewater, to make a claim that Blake Bortles is a better value than Kirk Cousins and to run through the various teams he sees as up and down in terms of what he's seen so far in training camp. Will also breaks down Hard Knocks and backs up his claim that the Browns are the most entertaining team in football.
